summary: adds a weapon speed enchantment for gloves.
descriptionHtml:
increase your attack speed with this enchantment skilled enchanters may find it too fast if so just let me know :)

due to lack of time the only way to currently get the gloves is through the console!
a short and simple instruction to get the gloves with the console for those who don't know
#1 open the console ~
#2 type help "Lightweight Iron Gauntlets"
#3 type player.additem <itemID> <count>
author: beagle547
